Configuration.SplashInfo: This application contains variety of scenarios demonstrating different capabilities and customizations of the Telerik UI for .NET MAUI component suite

Control.Name: Accordion
Control.ShortDescription: Helps you save screen space and at the same time present data.
Control.FullDescription: Telerik UI for .NET MAUI Accordion is a vertically collapsible content panel that displays only one of its items at a time within the available space. It helps you save screen space and at the same time present the content to the end user in an easily accessible way.

Example.Name: FirstLook
Example.Description: Telerik UI for .NET MAUI Accordion is a vertically collapsible content panel that displays only one of its items at a time within the available space. It helps you save screen space and at the same time present the content to the end user in an easily accessible way.

Example.Name: Customization
Example.Description: Demonstrates how you can customize the visual appearance of the Accordion control by changing the ControlTemplate of the AccordionItemHeader and having various controls in the content of the AccordionItem.

Example.Name: Configuration
Example.Description: This example presents the various configuration options that the RadAccordion provides. Adjust the expanding/collapsing and the spacing of the items, and choose whether to play animation, applying easings or custom duration to it.

Control.Name: AutoComplete
Control.ShortDescription: Provides suggestions while typing into a field.
Control.FullDescription: Telerik UI for .NET MAUI AutoComplete control provides suggestions while typing into a field, can complete user input and display multiple chosen tokens.

Example.Name: FirstLook
Example.Description: Telerik UI for .NET MAUI AutoComplete control provides suggestions while typing into a field, can complete user input and display multiple chosen tokens.

Example.Name: Customization
Example.Description: Demonstrates how you could customize the visual appearance of the AutoComplete control through various templates such as TokenTemplate, SuggestionItemTemplate, etc.

Control.Name: BadgeView
Control.ShortDescription: Can be used for an additional marker for any element.
Control.FullDescription: Telerik UI for .NET MAUI BadgeView allows you to display badges in your application. To decorate avatars, navigation menus, or other components in the application when the visual notification is needed.

Example.Name: FirstLook
Example.Description: Telerik UI for .NET MAUI BadgeView allows you to display badges in your application. To decorate avatars, navigation menus, or other components in the application when the visual notification is needed.

Example.Name: Configuration
Example.Description: This example presents the various configuration options that the RadBadgeView provides. You can change the Badge BackgroundColor, Text and TextColor, Horizontal and Vertical Position and Alignment, Offset, Animation Duration and Animation Easing.

Control.Name: Barcode
Control.ShortDescription: UI component used for creating and showing 1D and 2D barcodes.
Control.FullDescription: Telerik UI for .NET MAUI Barcode is a control used for creating and showing barcodes. You can generate and visualize barcodes in a machine-readable format via the RadBarcode control by providing numeric or character data.

Example.Name: BoardingPass
Example.Description: Telerik UI for .NET MAUI Barcode is a control used for creating and showing barcodes. You can generate and visualize barcodes in a machine-readable format via the RadBarcode control by providing numeric or character data.

Example.Name: DataMatrix
Example.Description: Data Matrix barcode is a two-dimensional type of code used widely in industry for marking small parts and items due to its high data density and reliability.

Example.Name: SpecialOffer
Example.Description: In this example a Barcode for .NET MAUI is used to generate a linear (1D) barcode in order to identify a discount coupon. With RadBarcode you can choose between several types of 1D and 2D barcode symbologies and have also control over the visual appearance and sizing of your barcodes.

Example.Name: Barcode1DGallery
Example.Description: This example demonstrates the different linear (1D) barcodes the RadBarcode could generate including the most popular ones such as EAN13, EAN8, UPC-A, UPC-E and Code39.

Example.Name: SwissQRCode
Example.Description: With RadBarcode you could generate a SwissQRCode, which contains all the information needed for an automatic and efficient payment.

Control.Name: Border
Control.ShortDescription: Provides full control over the look & feel of the border that wraps around your views.
Control.FullDescription: With Telerik UI for .NET MAUI Border you will have full control over the look & feel of the border that wraps around your .NET MAUI views. You could surround any view such as Label, Image, and so on and specify different border thickness and corner radius on each side.

Example.Name: FirstLook
Example.Description: With Telerik UI for .NET MAUI Border you will have full control over the look & feel of the border that wraps around your .NET MAUI views. You could surround any view such as Label, Image, and so on and specify different border thickness and corner radius on each side.

Example.Name: Configuration
Example.Description: RadBorder provides a few useful properties for configuring its color, thickness and corner radius. This example lets you play with these properties and see the result right away.

Control.Name: BusyIndicator
Control.ShortDescription: Provides an easy way to display a busy or a loading indication.
Control.FullDescription: Telerik UI for .NET MAUI BusyIndicator enables you to display a notification whenever a longer-running process is being handled by the application. This makes the UI more informative and the user experience smoother. It also allows you to easily customize the appearance and even implement custom animations.

Example.Name: FirstLook
Example.Description: Telerik UI for .NET MAUI BusyIndicator enables you to display a notification whenever a longer-running process is being handled by the application. This makes the UI more informative and the user experience smoother. It also allows you to easily customize the appearance and even implement custom animations.

Control.Name: Button
Control.ShortDescription: Enhances the .NET MAUI Button by providing additional features related to UI customizations.
Control.FullDescription: Telerik UI for .NET MAUI Button enhances the .NET MAUI Button by providing additional features such as the ability to set a background image, change the border thickness, and the alignment of the button's content.

Example.Name: FirstLook
Example.Description: Telerik UI for .NET MAUI Button enhances the .NET MAUI Button by providing additional features such as the ability to set a background image, change the border thickness, and the alignment of the button's content.

Control.Name: Calendar
Control.ShortDescription: Allows single, multiple and range date selection as well as displaying dates in different views.
Control.FullDescription: Telerik UI for .NET MAUI Calendar is an advanced date input control offering various display modes and enabling single, multiple and range date selection options.

Example.Name: FirstLook
Example.Description: Telerik UI for .NET MAUI Calendar is an advanced date input control offering various display modes and enabling single, multiple and range date selection options.

Example.Name: DisplayMode
Example.Description: This example presents the various display views that the RadCalendar supports - month, year, decade, century, as well as the ability to determine which should be the minimum and maximum display mode. For example, setting the MinDisplayMode to Month and the MaxDisplayMode to Year, you will be able to select only days and months from this year.

Example.Name: Selection
Example.Description: This example presents the selection modes that the RadCalendar supports - Single, Multiple and Range. The selection can also be disabled by setting the SelectionMode property to None. The default selection mode of the calendar is Single.

Example.Name: Globalization
Example.Description: This example presents the support for the different .NET Framework calendar implementations which include Gregorian, Hijri, Persian, etc. The desired calendar implementation can be specified through the Culture property of the RadCalendar.

Example.Name: BlackoutDates
Example.Description: This example presents the ability of the RadCalendar to mark some of its dates as not selectable (e.g., all past dates, official holidays, code freeze periods, etc.). The feature is enabled through the BlackoutDates collection of the calendar.

Example.Name: Customization
Example.Description: This example presents a tiny bit of the customization capabilities of the RadCalendar component mostly in terms of styling (DayStyleSelector, DayTemplate, HeaderBorderStyle). Some dates of the Month view are marked with different symbols and colors to indicate that there is a reminder, which is displayed once the respective date is selected.

Example.Name: Configuration
Example.Description: This example presents the various configuration options that the RadCalendar provides. Adjust the date settings, determine the first day of week, and explore the interaction, selection and navigation modes.

Control.Name: Chart
Control.ShortDescription: A large collection of chart and graph types for data visualization.
Control.FullDescription: Telerik UI for .NET MAUI Chart is a feature-rich, intuitive and easy to use data visualization control which employs the Maui technology and allows you to build native apps in C# and XAML.

Example.Name: AreaSeries
Example.Description: Area charts display different colors in the areas below the lines. This colorful and visual display distinguishes the data clearly. The Area charts support Stack, Stack100 and standard plotting modes.

Example.Name: BarSeries
Example.Description: Bar chart is one of the most common type of graphs used to display data. Sometimes known as 'column charts' depending on the orientation, bar charts are used to visualize data points as bar blocks where the width/height of each bar denotes the magnitude of its value.

Example.Name: FinancialSeries
Example.Description: The financial series are represented by the OhlcSeries and CandlestickSeries classes which differ in the way they visualize the data point. OHLC stands for Open, High, Low and Close.

Example.Name: FinancialIndicators
Example.Description: The financial indicators are a collection of DataPoints (calculated with different algorithms using the series data) visualized using Line Shape.

Example.Name: LineSeries
Example.Description: Line charts are often used to plot changes in data over time, such as monthly temperature changes or daily changes in stock market prices. If you are plotting changes in data over time, time is plotted along the horizontal axis and your other data is plotted as individual points along the vertical axis.

Example.Name: NullValues
Example.Description: Line charts and area charts can visualize null values as gaps in the chart.

Example.Name: ScatterSeries
Example.Description: A scatter chart is a two-dimensional graphical representation of a set of data where each x/y variable is represented on the graph as a dot. This type of chart can be used in to visually describe relationships between two numerical parameters or to represent distributions.

Example.Name: PieDonutSeries
Example.Description: The pie chart visualizes its data in the shape of a pie. Each data item is visually represented by a pie/donut slice. The ratio between the space consumed by each slice and the space consumed by the whole chart is the same as the ratio between the value of the data point that it represents and the total value of all data points in the series.

Control.Name: Chat
Control.ShortDescription: Provides flexible API for achieving a variety of chat and chat-bot scenarios.
Control.FullDescription: RadChat enables easy implementation of conversational UI in MAUI applications, whether by utilizing certain chatbot frameworks, by following a predefined logical tree, or just for integrating P2P chat capabilities.

Example.Name: TravelAssistance
Example.Description: This example demonstrates a possible implementation of the RadChat control for a travel agency by integrating it with the Microsoft Bot Framework via Azure Bot Service.

Example.Name: ChatRoom
Example.Description: This example demonstrates one way to go about implementing a chat room with multiple participants. Some of the features that are demonstrated are: typing indicator, timebreaks, color customization, MVVM support.

Example.Name: Configuration
Example.Description: This example demonstrates the various message types that the RadChat provides as well as how they can be customized. You can add new messages by choosing the type from the dropdown and clicking the Add Message button. The message will then be added based on the current configuration.

Control.Name: CheckBox
Control.ShortDescription: Enables users to choose between two mutually exclusive options.
Control.FullDescription: Telerik UI for .NET MAUI CheckBox is a checkbox control that enables users to make a choice between two mutually exclusive options. In addition, RadCheckBox provides an indeterminate state which indicates the control is neither checked nor unchecked. RadCheckBox exposes various Color properties you could use to customize its visual appearance so that it matches the look & feel of your app.

Example.Name: FirstLook
Example.Description: Telerik UI for .NET MAUI CheckBox is a checkbox control that enables users to make a choice between two mutually exclusive options. In addition, RadCheckBox provides an indeterminate state which indicates the control is neither checked nor unchecked. RadCheckBox exposes various Color properties you could use to customize its visual appearance so that it matches the look & feel of your app.

Control.Name: ComboBox
Control.ShortDescription: Allows users to select item/items from a drop-down list of items.
Control.FullDescription: Telerik UI for .NET MAUI ComboBox allows users to select item/items from a drop-down list of items. The control has a number of features such as editing, searching, single and multiple selection, flexible styling API, dropdown customizations, and more.

Example.Name: FirstLook
Example.Description: Telerik UI for .NET MAUI ComboBox allows users to select item/items from a drop-down list of items. The control has a number of features such as editing, searching, single and multiple selection, flexible styling API, dropdown customizations, and more.

Example.Name: Configuration
Example.Description: This example presents the various configuration options that the RadComboBox provides. You can change the control's editable state, selection mode, whether the clear button will be visible, etc.

Control.Name: DataForm
Control.ShortDescription: A fully customizable form control for collecting business object data.
Control.FullDescription: Telerik UI for .NET MAUI DataForm is a customizable component allowing you to easily create a form for collecting or editing business object data.

Example.Name: FirstLook
Example.Description: Telerik UI for .NET MAUI DataForm is a customizable component allowing you to easily create a form for collecting or editing business object data.

Example.Name: Customization
Example.Description: Demonstrates the customization options DataForm provides. Easily style the editors, headers in a way you want using the flexible styling API.

Example.Name: CustomEditors
Example.Description: Demonstrates the custom editors feature of the DataForm control. The example contains custom editors like Rating, AutoComplete, CheckBox and Editor.

Control.Name: DataGrid
Control.ShortDescription: A powerful and feature-rich control used to visualize and edit data represented in a tabular fashion.
Control.FullDescription: Telerik UI for .NET MAUI DataGrid control provides the ability to easily perform operations like sorting, filtering, grouping and editing over the underlying data.

Example.Name: FirstLook
Example.Description: Telerik UI for .NET MAUI DataGrid control provides the ability to easily perform operations like sorting, filtering, grouping and editing over the underlying data.

Example.Name: FrozenColumns
Example.Description: Telerik UI for .NET MAUI DataGrid provides an easy way to select one or more columns and exclude them from the horizontal scrolling. The frozen columns stay static on top of the horizontal scrolling. In order to freeze/unfreeze the columns use the configuration UI of the page.

Example.Name: AggregateSupport
Example.Description: Demonstrates how you can easily use the built-in aggregate functionality of the DataGrid in order to sum data, count data, etc.

Example.Name: BillionCells
Example.Description: Demonstrates how you can easily store big clusters of data in the DataGrid

Example.Name: ColumnTypes
Example.Description: Demonstrates the different type of columns that DataGrid control provides. Column types such as Text, Boolean, Template, Date, Time, Numeric.

Example.Name: DataFormatting
Example.Description: Demonstrates the custom data formatting supported by the .NET MAUI DataGrid. This allows displaying of the data as currency, percentage or any other format. You can also use a custom value converter to display data in a readable way. The data formatting is set through the DataGridColumn DataMemberBinding property.

Example.Name: Selection
Example.Description: Demonstrates the DataGrid Selection feature. You can easily disable the selection, apply single or multiple selection. When selection is on, it can be applied to DataGrid Cell or Row.

Example.Name: Grouping
Example.Description: Demonstrates the Grouping feature of the DataGrid. You can drag the column headers onto a grouping panel, easily enable/disable the grouping, and programmatically group the DataGrid.

Example.Name: VariousDataSources
Example.Description: Demonstrates how you can easily populate DataGrid from collection or from a DataTable.

Example.Name: EmptyTemplate
Example.Description: Demonstrates the ability of the DataGrid to specify and show a custom template when the ItemsSource is null or an empty collection is provided.

Example.Name: HeaderContentTemplate
Example.Description: Demonstrates the ability of the DataGrid to specify and show custom appearance for the column headers by means of Header Content Template.

Example.Name: RowDetails
Example.Description: Demonstrates the ability of each row of the DataGrid to present additional information by means of Row Details without affecting the dimensions of the row and the cells.

Example.Name: Customization
Example.Description: Demonstrates how you could customize the visual appearance of the DataGrid control through various Style and StyleSelector properties such as CellContentStyle, CellDecorationStyle, SelectionStyle, GroupHeaderStyleSelector, HeaderStyle, etc.

Control.Name: DatePicker
Control.ShortDescription: Enables users to easily and intuitively select a date via a customizable spinner dialog.
Control.FullDescription: Telerik UI for .NET MAUI DatePicker allows the users to select a date. Its items are visualized inside a popup. Date Picker control has a number of features which allows you to set a date range, date format, and fully customize the dialog appearance such as its header and footer.

Example.Name: FirstLook
Example.Description: Telerik UI for .NET MAUI DatePicker allows the users to select a date. Its items are visualized inside a popup. Date Picker control has a number of features which allows you to set a date range, date format, and fully customize the dialog appearance such as its header and footer.

Control.Name: DateTimePicker
Control.ShortDescription: Provides an easy way to pick a date, time or date and time via a customizable spinner dialog.
Control.FullDescription: Telerik UI for .NET MAUI DateTimePicker enables users to easily pick a date, time, or both from a pre-defined set of values. The DateTimePicker control has several features which allow you to set a date range, date, and time format and fully customize the dialog appearance.

Example.Name: FirstLook
Example.Description: Telerik UI for .NET MAUI DateTimePicker enables users to easily pick a date, time, or both from a pre-defined set of values. The DateTimePicker control has several features which allow you to set a date range, date, and time format and fully customize the dialog appearance.

Control.Name: DockLayout
Control.ShortDescription: Enables users to dock child elements of the application at a certain position on the screen.
Control.FullDescription: Telerik UI for .NET MAUI DockLayout is a layout that provides a mechanism for child elements to be docked to the left, right, top or bottom edge of the layout. You could easily define the docking side of each element through a RadDockLayout.Dock attached property. In addition, you can determine whether the last child element inside the layout will occupy the remaining available space.

Example.Name: FirstLook
Example.Description: Telerik UI for .NET MAUI DockLayout is a layout that provides a mechanism for child elements to be docked to the left, right, top or bottom edge of the layout. You could easily define the docking side of each element through a RadDockLayout.Dock attached property. In addition, you can determine whether the last child element inside the layout will occupy the remaining available space.

Control.Name: Entry
Control.ShortDescription: Enhances the Maui Entry by providing means for customizing its look and adding an input validation feature.
Control.FullDescription: Telerik UI for .NET MAUI Entry is a text input control, which accepts text input from the user and provides consistent look and feel with the rest of the Telerik UI for .NET MAUI. It also has a validation API and corresponding error UI.

Example.Name: FirstLook
Example.Description: Telerik UI for .NET MAUI Entry is a text input control, which accepts text input from the user and provides consistent look and feel with the rest of the Telerik UI for .NET MAUI. It also has a validation API and corresponding error UI.

Example.Name: Configuration
Example.Description: This example presents various configuration options that the RadEntry control provides.

Control.Name: Expander
Control.ShortDescription: Hosts any piece of UI in a container, which can be easily expanded/collapsed, saving screen space.
Control.FullDescription: Telerik UI for .NET MAUI Expander helps you save screen space by presenting content in an expandable container that can be easily expanded/collapsed by tapping on the header of the control.

Example.Name: FirstLook
Example.Description: Telerik UI for .NET MAUI Expander helps you save screen space by presenting content in an expandable container that can be easily expanded/collapsed by tapping on the header of the control.

Control.Name: Gauge
Control.ShortDescription: A set of highly customizable, animated and user-friendly linear and radial gauges.
Control.FullDescription: Telerik UI for .NET MAUI Gauge is an essential data visualization component that uses indicators to display numeric values and uses ranges to give context to the indicated values.

Example.Name: FirstLook
Example.Description: Telerik UI for .NET MAUI Gauge is an essential data visualization component that uses indicators to display numeric values and uses ranges to give context to the indicated values.

Control.Name: ImageEditor
Control.ShortDescription: ImageEditor control is a powerful tool that allows you to easily visualize, edit and save images in your desktop or mobile application.
Control.FullDescription: Telerik UI for .NET MAUI ImageEditor control is a powerful tool that allows you to easily visualize, edit and save images in your desktop or mobile application. It supports different file formats and comes with standard editing options such as zoom and pan, undo and redo, load and save an image, flip and rotate, resize and crop. Additionally, the control is packed with a variety of tools, filters, and other advanced functions.

Example.Name: FirstLook
Example.Description: ImageEditor control is a powerful tool that allows you to easily visualize, edit and save images in your desktop or mobile application. It supports different file formats and comes with standard editing options such as zoom and pan, undo and redo, load and save an image, flip and rotate, resize and crop. Additionally, the control is packed with a variety of tools, filters, and other advanced functions.

Control.Name: ItemsControl
Control.ShortDescription: Enables users to visualize a list of items and customize the way each item looks using the provided template.
Control.FullDescription: Telerik UI for .NET MAUI ItemsControl enables you to visualize a list of items and provides full control over the way each item is rendered through the supported item template.

Example.Name: FirstLook
Example.Description: Telerik UI for .NET MAUI ItemsControl enables you to visualize a list of items and provides full control over the way each item is rendered through the supported item template.

Control.Name: ListPicker
Control.ShortDescription: Allows users to select an item from a list, visualized inside a customizable spinner dialog.
Control.FullDescription: Telerik UI for .NET MAUI ListPicker provides an elegant UI experience for end users who need to pick an item from a pre-defined list. The ListPicker component loops its listed items infinitely while scrolling and is flexible to various customizations to ensure consistent user experience across cross-platform applications. Developers can easily customize the dialog appearance, style the listed and selected items and define a placeholder text when an item is not selected.

Example.Name: FirstLook
Example.Description: Telerik UI for .NET MAUI ListPicker provides an elegant UI experience for end users who need to pick an item from a pre-defined list. The ListPicker component loops its listed items infinitely while scrolling and is flexible to various customizations to ensure consistent user experience across cross-platform applications. Developers can easily customize the dialog appearance, style the listed and selected items and define a placeholder text when an item is not selected.

Control.Name: ListView
Control.ShortDescription: A virtualized list control that provides the most commonly needed features when displaying a list of items.
Control.FullDescription: Telerik UI for .NET MAUI ListView is a virtualized high-performance list component that provides the most popular features associated with scenarios where a list of items is used. All these features are embedded in one control with the idea to save developer time and provide a better experience. The control's features include different layouts, pull-to-refresh, grouping, swipe gestures, changing the items' order by drag and drop operation, and more.

Example.Name: FirstLook
Example.Description: Telerik UI for .NET MAUI ListView is a virtualized high-performance list component that provides the most popular features associated with scenarios where a list of items is used. All these features are embedded in one control with the idea to save developer time and provide a better experience. The control's features include different layouts, pull-to-refresh, grouping, swipe gestures, changing the items' order by drag and drop operation, and more.

Control.Name: Map
Control.ShortDescription: Visualizes stunning map overlays through ESRI Shapefiles straight into your application.
Control.FullDescription: Telerik UI for .NET MAUI Map lets you display stunning map overlays using ESRI Shapefiles. The control provides support for labels, multiple, single selection and powerful customization APIs.

Example.Name: FirstLook
Example.Description: Telerik UI for .NET MAUI Map lets you display stunning map overlays using ESRI Shapefiles. The control provides support for labels, multiple, single selection and powerful customization APIs.

Control.Name: MaskedEntry
Control.ShortDescription: Provides an easy way to restrict user input to most commonly used masked input types.
Control.FullDescription: Telerik UI for .NET MAUI MaskedEntry formats and restricts text inputs to predefined or defined patterns, and provides input validation and masks, such as text, Regex, IP, email, and numeric.

Example.Name: FirstLook
Example.Description: Telerik UI for .NET MAUI MaskedEntry formats and restricts text inputs to predefined or defined patterns, and provides input validation and masks, such as text, Regex, IP, email, and numeric.

Control.Name: NavigationView
Control.ShortDescription: An adaptive control used to build consistent navigational experience that layouts its items in a vertical layout.
Control.FullDescription: The Telerik UI for .NET MAUI NavigationView is an adaptive control, used to build a consistent navigational experience. It features different options for displaying the navigation pane, adding header and footer to the pane and flexible customization API.

Example.Name: FirstLook
Example.Description: The Telerik UI for .NET MAUI NavigationView is an adaptive control, used to build a consistent navigational experience. It features different options for displaying the navigation pane, adding header and footer to the pane and flexible customization API.

Example.Name: DataBinding
Example.Description: This example demonstrates binding to a complex object by using the RadNavigationView ItemsSource property.

Example.Name: Configuration
Example.Description: This example shows the main properties that can be used to configure the RadNavigationView control such as CompactWidth, ExpandedWidth, Header content and others.

Control.Name: NumericInput
Control.ShortDescription: Highly customizable input control for entering numeric data.
Control.FullDescription: Telerik UI for .NET MAUI NumericInput is a highly customizable input control for numeric data. It allows the user to set/edit a number using the decrease and increase buttons or directly enter it in the input field. RadNumericInput also provides consistent look with the rest of the controls from the Telerik UI for .NET MAUI suite.

Example.Name: FirstLook
Example.Description: Telerik UI for .NET MAUI NumericInput is a highly customizable input control for numeric data. It allows the user to set/edit a number using the decrease and increase buttons or directly enter it in the input field. RadNumericInput also provides consistent look with the rest of the controls from the Telerik UI for .NET MAUI suite.

Control.Name: Path
Control.ShortDescription: Draws complex shapes composed of different geometries as arcs, ellipses, lines and rectangles.
Control.FullDescription: Telerik UI for .NET MAUI Path is a control that can be used to draw complex shapes that can be composed of different geometries like arcs, ellipses, lines, and rectangles.

Example.Name: Figures
Example.Description: Telerik UI for .NET MAUI Path is a control that can be used to draw complex shapes that can be composed of different geometries like arcs, ellipses, lines, and rectangles.

Control.Name: PdfProcessing
Control.ShortDescription: Processing library that allows creation, import and export of PDF documents.
Control.FullDescription: Telerik PdfProcessing is a processing library that allows you to create, import and export PDF documents from your code. The API of RadPdfProcessing contains two different editors, enabling you to choose between editing in a flow-like manner, or using the much more powerful and flexible fixed document structure and drawing on the page.

Example.Name: FirstLook
Example.Description: Telerik PdfProcessing is a processing library that allows you to create, import and export PDF documents from your code. The API of RadPdfProcessing contains two different editors, enabling you to choose between editing in a flow-like manner, or using the much more powerful and flexible fixed document structure and drawing on the page. This example demonstrates how to create a document containing images, text and shapes and export it to PDF.

Example.Name: NotEmbeddingFonts
Example.Description: Telerik PdfProcessing provides easy to use API which allows choosing whether the font files to be embedded when exporting PDF documents. This example shows the initial size of an imported document and the reduced one after removing the fonts and saving it. Disclaimer: Removing the fonts from the document makes it dependent on the operational system to provide the needed fonts. If they are not installed, the document won't be successfully opened.

Example.Name: PermissionsAndEncryption
Example.Description: Telerik PdfProcessing provides easy to use API which allows setting different permissions and encryption when exporting encrypted PDF documents. This example demonstrates the different settings available that could be applied to the exported document. The password will be required when trying to change the already set document permissions. The currently supported encryption algorithms when exporting encrypted documents are RC4 and AES-256.

Control.Name: PdfViewer
Control.ShortDescription: Enables you to easily load and display PDF documents natively in your application.
Control.FullDescription: Telerik UI for .NET MAUI PdfViewer is a control that can visualize PDF documents straight into your application. It has been made more than simple with the exposed commands that can be easily bound to and the full integration with the RadPdfViewerToolbar.

Example.Name: FirstLook
Example.Description: Telerik UI for .NET MAUI PdfViewer is a control that can visualize PDF documents straight into your application. It has been made more than simple with the exposed commands that can be easily bound to and the full integration with the RadPdfViewerToolbar.

Example.Name: LargeFile
Example.Description: Demonstrates the read-on-demand feature that allows to quickly open large files. This is done by loading a page on demand when it enters the viewable area instead of loading the whole document initially.

Example.Name: OpenSaveShare
Example.Description: This example showcases how to utilize the PDFViewer Toolbar to perform actions such as opening, saving, or sharing PDF files. It provides a demonstration of the seamless integration of these functionalities within the toolbar, allowing users to conveniently manage their PDF documents.

Example.Name: Customization
Example.Description: This example showcases the ease with which the visual appearance of the PDFViewer toolbar and search settings can be customized. By simply adjusting the color, alignment, and positioning of items, you can personalize the look and feel of the PDFViewer according to your preferences.

Example.Name: Configuration
Example.Description: This example highlights the diverse range of configuration options available in the PDF Viewer. You have the ability to fine-tune the spacing between the pages, or set limitations on the zoom level, controlling the extent to which users can enlarge or reduce the content within the control.

Control.Name: Popup
Control.ShortDescription: Displays an alert dialog or a popup in the mobile app in a position of your choice.
Control.FullDescription: Telerik UI for .NET MAUI Popup lets you display content of your choice on top of existing view. You could define whether the Popup will be modal or not as well as control its position through various placement settings.

Example.Name: ContextMenu
Example.Description: Telerik UI for .NET MAUI Popup lets you display content of your choice on top of existing view. You could define whether the Popup will be modal or not as well as control its position through various placement settings.

Control.Name: ProgressBar
Control.ShortDescription: Displays progress information to the users during a long-running operation.
Control.FullDescription: Telerik UI for .NET MAUI ProgressBar displays progress information to the users during a long-running operation. With the ProgressBar you can track the progress of various tasks.

Example.Name: FirstLook
Example.Description: Telerik UI for .NET MAUI ProgressBar control is primarily used to indicate the progress of a long-running operation on a desktop or mobile device. It can show multiple forms of progress, such as data loading or a multi-step user action, in which you can visualize how much has been completed and what remains.

Example.Name: Customization
Example.Description: This example demonstrates how to modify the look and feel of the ProgressBar to simulate a cloud upload process, the progress of which is displayed in the shape of a cloud and filled in a vertical direction.

Example.Name: Configuration
Example.Description: This example presents various configuration options that the ProgressBar control provides.

Control.Name: RangeSlider
Control.ShortDescription: Specifies a range between a minimum and a maximum value by moving the start and end thumbs along the track.
Control.FullDescription: Telerik UI for .NET MAUI RangeSlider allows specifying a range between a minimum and a maximum value by moving the start and end thumbs along the track.

Example.Name: FirstLook
Example.Description: Telerik UI for .NET MAUI RangeSlider control allows selecting a range of values within the specified minimum and maximum limits. This example presents one of the most common scenarios enabling the end users to limit a list of available items (rental properties) falling into certain range in terms of price per night and number of guests.

Example.Name: Configuration
Example.Description: This example presents various configuration options that the RangeSlider control provides. Adjust the ticks and labels placement, frequency, colors, size, customize the look of the track and thumb elements, and explore the snap and drag modes.

Control.Name: Rating
Control.ShortDescription: Allows users to intuitively rate by selecting number of items/stars from a predefined number.
Control.FullDescription: Telerik UI for .NET MAUI Rating is a flexible UI component that allows users to intuitively rate by making a selection.

Example.Name: RestaurantReview
Example.Description: Telerik UI for .NET MAUI Rating is a flexible UI component that allows users to intuitively rate by making a selection.

Control.Name: RichTextEditor
Control.ShortDescription: WYSIWYG control that can display and edit HTML content.
Control.FullDescription: Telerik UI for .NET MAUI RadRichTextEditor is a WYSIWYG control that can display and edit HTML content.

Example.Name: FirstLook
Example.Description: This example demonstrates how to setup RadRichTextEditor and RadRichTextEditorToolbar to visualize and edit HTML content.

Example.Name: ImportExport
Example.Description: This example demonstrates how to import and export the content of the RichTextEditor component to various formats, such as HTML, DOCX, RTF and TXT.

Example.Name: CustomToolbar
Example.Description: The RichTextEditor for .NET MAUI allows you to customize its toolbar both visually and by defining custom tools. This example demonstrates how to style the toolbar, as well as include Undo and Redo toolbar items, a group of custom styled items, items for modifying the colors of the document, and a custom emoji picker.

Control.Name: Scheduler
Control.ShortDescription: A scheduling component, designed to go beyond the standard Microsoft Outlook-style control and empower the end users with unprecedented control over precision and flexibility when handling appointments.
Control.FullDescription: Telerik UI for .NET MAUI Scheduler allows you to easily implement various scheduling scenarios in your apps. It offers highly customizable built-in view definitions for which you can adjust the current time, visible hours and dates, time ruler, special time slots, total control over the look of the appointments and more.

Example.Name: FirstLook
Example.Description: The Telerik UI for .NET MAUI Scheduler allows you to easily implement various scheduling scenarios in your apps. This example showcases the utilisation of the Scheduler's supported view definitions in a MVVM environment.

Example.Name: Configuration
Example.Description: This example presents the various configuration options that the RadScheduler provides. Adjust the time ruler, determine the first day of week, whether to display time indicator, work week and explore the interaction modes.

Control.Name: SegmentedControl
Control.ShortDescription: Displays horizontally aligned, mutually exclusive options, which can be selected by the user.
Control.FullDescription: Telerik UI for .NET MAUI SegmentedControl enables you to display several options in a convenient picker and select value with a single tap.

Example.Name: FirstLook
Example.Description: Telerik UI for .NET MAUI SegmentedControl enables you to display several options in a convenient picker and select value with a single tap. This example showcases the usage of the SegmentedControl in a MVVM environment. Images can easily be displayed in the SegmentedControl, and styles can be used to achieve the same look for the SegmentedControl's in your application.

Control.Name: SideDrawer
Control.ShortDescription: Designed to enable users to visualize a hidden view in their applications.
Control.FullDescription: Telerik UI for .NET MAUI SideDrawer allows you to visualize a hidden view inside your application. The control has two views, MainContent and DrawerContent. The hiddenview (DrawerContent) can be visualized using a flick gesture and can be shown from all four sides of the screen.

Example.Name: FirstLook
Example.Description: Telerik UI for .NET MAUI SideDrawer allows you to visualize a hidden view inside your application. The control has two views, MainContent and DrawerContent. The hiddenview (DrawerContent) can be visualized using a flick gesture and can be shown from all four sides of the screen.

Control.Name: SignaturePad
Control.ShortDescription: SignaturePad for .NET MAUI is designed to enable users to draw and save signatures.
Control.FullDescription: Telerik UI for .NET MAUI SignaturePad for .NET MAUI is designed to enable users to draw and save signatures.

Example.Name: FirstLook
Example.Description: This example shows the ability to draw a signature in RadSignaturePad, save this signature as image and then visualize it.

Control.Name: Slider
Control.ShortDescription: A flexible UI component that allows users to select a value from a defined range using a smooth or step-based sliding.
Control.FullDescription: Telerik UI for .NET MAUI Slider is a flexible UI component that allows users to select a value from a defined range. It is completely customizable in terms of appearance and offers numerous configuration options.

Example.Name: FirstLook
Example.Description: Telerik UI for .NET MAUI Slider is a flexible UI component that allows users to select a value from a defined range using a smooth or step-based sliding.

Example.Name: Configuration
Example.Description: This example presents various configuration options that the Slider control provides. Adjust the ticks and labels placement, frequency, colors, size, customize the look of the track and thumb, and explore the snap and drag modes.

Control.Name: SlideView
Control.ShortDescription: Represents items/views with only one active at a time and allows to easily slide (navigate) to the next/previous via panning.
Control.FullDescription: Telerik UI for .NET MAUI SlideView represents items/views with only one active at a time and allows to easily slide (navigate) to the next/previous via panning.

Example.Name: FirstLook
Example.Description: Telerik UI for .NET MAUI SlideView is a flexible navigation control that allows you to slide between different views, thus providing an interactive navigation. With it you can build a gallery display to show your images and content efficiently.

Example.Name: Configuration
Example.Description: This example presents the various configuration options of the RadSlideView and its indicator. Switch the orientation, interaction and overscroll modes, toggle looping of and tune in the animation.

Control.Name: SpreadProcessing
Control.ShortDescription: Easily import, modify and export files to and from the most common spreadsheet file formats.
Control.FullDescription: Telerik SpreadProcessing is a powerful library that enables you to create applications with native support for spreadsheet documents. With RadSpreadProcessing, you can create spreadsheets from scratch, modify existing documents or convert between the most common spreadsheet formats.

Example.Name: FirstLook
Example.Description: Telerik SpreadProcessing is a powerful library that enables you to create applications with native support for spreadsheet documents. With RadSpreadProcessing, you can create spreadsheets from scratch, modify existing documents or convert between the most common spreadsheet formats.

Example.Name: Convert
Example.Description: An example that demonstrates how to import documents and convert to different formats.

Example.Name: FindAndReplace
Example.Description: A demonstration of the built-in Find and Replace functionality in the SpreadProcessing library.

Example.Name: ConditionalFormatting
Example.Description: Telerik SpreadProcessing supports conditional visual formatting based on the underlying data of the worksheet. It allows you to create new rules, or modify existing ones. The current example demostrates how to add conditional formatting elements programatically, while showcasing some of the rule options.

Example.Name: AddNotes
Example.Description: Telerik SpreadProcessing allows you to insert a Note related to a cell on a specific document position. The example demonstrates how you can add notes with custom Author and Text while generating a document, and then view the document.

Example.Name: AddComments
Example.Description: Telerik SpreadProcessing allows you to insert a Comment related to a cell. The example demonstrates how you can add comments with custom Author and Text while generating a document, and then view the document.

Control.Name: SpreadStreamProcessing
Control.ShortDescription: Create big spreadsheet documents with great performance and minimal memory footprint.
Control.FullDescription: Telerik SpreadStreamProcessing is a document processing library which allows you to create big spreadsheet documents with great performance and minimal memory footprint.

Example.Name: FirstLook
Example.Description: Telerik SpreadStreamProcessing is a document processing library which allows you to create big spreadsheet documents with great performance and minimal memory footprint.

Example.Name: ImportSpreadsheet
Example.Description: The example demonstrates how to import spreadsheet documents.

Control.Name: TabView
Control.ShortDescription: A flexible navigation control with tabbed interface.
Control.FullDescription: Telerik UI for .NET MAUI TabView is a flexible navigation control that allows you to build tabbed interfaces. Each TabView item has an associated content displayed on selection. The control is fully customizable.

Example.Name: WorldClock
Example.Description: Telerik UI for .NET MAUI TabView is a flexible navigation control that allows you to build tabbed interfaces. Each TabView item has an associated content displayed on selection. The control is fully customizable.

Control.Name: TemplatedPicker
Control.ShortDescription: Fully customizable picker control that covers a wide range of item selection scenarios.
Control.FullDescription: Telerik UI for .NET MAUI TemplatedPicker is a control designed to support the need for a tailored item selection based on various potential end-user scenarios (e.g. pick a country and city for a travel app). The Templated Picker enables you to define your custom template for an item selection and customize it to ensure user experience consistency across your application.

Example.Description: Telerik UI for .NET MAUI TemplatedPicker is a control designed to support the need for a tailored item selection based on various potential end-user scenarios (e.g. pick a country and city for a travel app). The Templated Picker enables you to define your custom template for an item selection and customize it to ensure user experience consistency across your application.
Example.Name: FirstLook

Control.Name: TimePicker
Control.ShortDescription: Provides a convenient way for the app users to select a time via a customizable spinner dialog.
Control.FullDescription: Telerik UI for .NET MAUI TimePicker provides a convenient way for the app users to select a time. Its items are visualized inside a popup. The control has a number of features which allows you to set a time range, time format and fully customize the dialog appearance such as its header and footer.

Example.Name: FirstLook
Example.Description: Telerik UI for .NET MAUI TimePicker provides a convenient way for the app users to select a time. Its items are visualized inside a popup. The control has a number of features which allows you to set a time range, time format and fully customize the dialog appearance such as its header and footer.

Control.Name: TimeSpanPicker
Control.ShortDescription: Provides an easy way to select a time duration via a customizable spinner dialog.
Control.FullDescription: Telerik UI for .NET MAUI TimeSpanPicker provides an easy way to select a time duration. The component represents a time interval and allows you to set a time range between two times measured in numbers of days, hours, minutes and seconds.

Example.Name: FirstLook
Example.Description: Telerik UI for .NET MAUI TimeSpanPicker provides an easy way to select a time duration. The component represents a time interval and allows you to set a time range between two times measured in numbers of days, hours, minutes and seconds.

Control.Name: Toolbar
Control.ShortDescription: RadToolbar is a flexible control for implementation of tool and button strips, needed in most desktop and mobile applications.
Control.FullDescription: Telerik UI for .NET MAUI Toolbar is a flexible control for implementation of tool and button strips, needed in most desktop and mobile applications. Its rich collection of ToolbarItems allows easy customization of every tool or button of the control independently according to the specific needs of the application.

Example.Name: FirstLook
Example.Description: Telerik UI for .NET MAUI Toolbar is a flexible control for implementation of tool and button strips, needed in most desktop and mobile applications. Its rich collection of ToolbarItems allows easy customization of every tool or button of the control independently according to the specific needs of the application.

Control.Name: TreeView
Control.ShortDescription: Displays data in a hierarchical structure with the ability to collapse or expand data nodes.
Control.FullDescription: Telerik UI for .NET MAUI TreeView facilitates display, management, and navigation of hierarchical data structures. The component comes with many advanced features - data binding, checkbox support, etc.

Example.Name: FirstLook
Example.Description: This example demonstrates how the RadTreeView component can be used within your application to organize your inbox messages in a tree-like folder structure.

Example.Name: Customization
Example.Description: This example demonstrates how to modify the look and feel of individual items based on their specific characteristics or roles within the tree. By defining separate ItemTemplates, you can effectively tailor the visual representation of different item types, enhancing the overall user experience and interface customization.

Example.Name: Configuration
Example.Description: This example presents the various configuration options that the RadTreeView provides. Choose the selection and checkbox modes, adjust the indentations and determine whether to display the expand buttons and images of the items.

Example.Name: LoadOnDemand
Example.Description: This example demonstrates how to utilize the Load On Demand feature in order to delay the population of RadTreeView and load subitems only when they are requested, thus improving the performance of your application.

Control.Name: WordsProcessing
Control.ShortDescription: Processing library that allows creation, import and export of DOCX documents.
Control.FullDescription: Telerik WordsProcessing is a processing library that allows code-only generation of documents. Through the API you can create a document from scratch and export it to one of the supported formats – Docx, Rtf, Html, PDF and Txt.

Example.Name: FirstLook
Example.Description: Telerik WordsProcessing is a processing library that allows code-only generation of documents. Through the API you can create a document from scratch and export it to one of the supported formats – Docx, Rtf, Html, PDF and Txt.

Example.Name: Export
Example.Description: This example demonstrates export of flow documents to PDF, RTF, HTML and TXT using RadWordsProcessing. You can use the imported Word(docx) sample and convert it to PDF, RTF, HTML, TXT.

Example.Name: FindAndReplace
Example.Description: This example illustrates the Replace functionality in RadWordsProcessing. You can replace or highlight text in the sample document, using regular expressions or strings and then export the document to view the result.

Example.Name: NumberingFields
Example.Description: This example illustrates the Page Numbering functionality in RadWordsProcessing.

Example.Name: TableOfContents
Example.Description: With RadWordsProcessing you can insert a Table of Contents (TOC) and/or a Table of Authorities (TOA) fields in your Docx, Rtf or PDF document. The TOC can collect entries from heading styles, other specified styles, outline levels, captions, or entries specified by TC (Table of Contents Entry) fields. The TOA collects entries marked by TA (Table of Authorities Entry) fields.

Control.Name: WrapLayout
Control.ShortDescription: Provides a mechanism for arranging child elements in rows or columns.
Control.FullDescription: Telerik UI for .NET MAUI WrapLayout provides a mechanism for arranging child elements in rows or columns depending on the Orientation property. When the available space is filled, the control wraps these elements on а new row or column.

Example.Name: FirstLook
Example.Description: Telerik UI for .NET MAUI WrapLayout provides a mechanism for arranging child elements in rows or columns depending on the Orientation property. When the available space is filled, the control wraps these elements on а new row or column.

Control.Name: ZipLibrary
Control.ShortDescription: Compress data like images, docx or pdf files and send them over the wire faster.
Control.FullDescription: Telerik ZipLibrary provides easy-to-use API to both create and load zip files as well as browse the contents of a zip file previously created. The API supports password protection and different compression levels. You can also create ZIP files in memory or add data to ZIP file from stream.

Example.Name: CreateArchive
Example.Description: Telerik ZipLibrary provides easy-to-use API to both create and load zip files as well as browse the contents of a zip file previously created. The API supports password protection and different compression levels. You can also create ZIP files in memory or add data to ZIP file from stream.
